duties_responsibilities.duty: Examine food animals in privately-owned meat or poultry plants.
Perform duties before and after slaughter to guarantee that the product is not contaminated.
Conduct pre-employment medical examinations and background investigations.
Monitor and assess animal health and production processes to verify compliance with standards and regulations.
Communicate effectively with supervisors and workers in the food industry.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in biological, physical, mathematical, or agricultural sciences (Master's preferred)
